1.Title: Computer vision for industrial applications
1.Description: How the big industry is trying to cope with IA and big data: collaborative robots, smart structures and industry 4.0

2.Title: Generating metamorphic programs using Machine Learning
2.Description: A state-of-the-art approach looking to produce highly metamorphic programs using recurrent neural networks

3.Title: Detecting COVID-19 with 97% accuracy: beware of the AI hype!
3.Description: A recent post which claims to detect COVID-19 using a deep neural network with a very high accuracy gains keen mediatic interest

4.Title: An introduction to Constraint Solvers
4.Description: This post will provide a quick grasp at constraint satisfaction, a powerful yet underused  approach which can tackle a large number of problems in AI and other areas of computer science, from logistics and scheduling to temporal reasoning and graph problems.

5.Title: Statistical decision theory for predictive models
5.Description: The quiet statisticians have changed our world; not by discovering new facts or technical developments, but by changing the ways that we reason, experiment and form our opinions.
